detail_desc: Top in ribbed jersey containing glittery threads. V-neck, spaghetti shoulder straps and a straight-cut hem.
Trainers with imitation suede details, a padded edge and tongue, lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Jersey linings, mesh insoles and chunky soles.
Jumper in a textured knit with terry hearts at the top, buttons at the front, long raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Fully lined, patterned bikini. V-neck top with a decorative bow at the front, flounce-trimmed shoulder straps and a plastic fastener at the back. Matching bottoms.

Tuxedo trousers in woven fabric with a concealed hook-and-eye fastening and zip fly. Side pockets, jetted back pockets and legs with satin stripes down the sides and creases. Slim fit that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a fitted silhouette.

Round-necked T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a print motif on the front. Press-stud on one shoulder (except in sizes 1-10Y) and a straight-cut hem. For the matching parent’s T-shirt, look for 0721930.

Cold shoulder blouse in an airy weave with a V-neck, narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and long sleeves with elastication and a flounce at the cuffs. Flounces at the front that continue around the shoulders to the back, an elasticated seam at the waist, and a flounce at the hem.
Short dress in jersey made from a viscose blend with narrow shoulder straps, a seam at the waist and a gently flared skirt. Unlined.
Fitted, straight-style top in soft jersey with a round neck and short puff sleeves.
STUDIO COLLECTION. V-neck jumper in a textured cotton knit with short raglan sleeves.
Swim top with a print motif and contrasting colour sections at the sides. Stand-up collar and long raglan sleeves. Slightly longer at the back. UPF 50.
Short, gently fitted dress in a viscose weave with a V-neck and buttons down the front. Short, elasticated puff sleeves. Unlined.

STUDIO COLLECTION. Tailored trousers woven in a wool blend with a high waist and tailored waistband. Pleats at the top to add width and soft draping to the legs, a zip fly and concealed hook-and-eye fastening, and side and back pockets.
Top in lightweight, printed sweatshirt fabric with long sleeves, ribbing around the neckline and cuffs, and a decorative tie at the hem.
Scarf in a patterned weave that can also be tied as a hairband. Size 55x55 cm.
Shirt woven in a cotton blend with a collar, buttons down the front, a chest pocket, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs and a rounded hem.

Set with a top and pair of leggings in soft cotton. Longer top in sweatshirt fabric with press-studs on one shoulder, dropped shoulders, long sleeves and a ribbed hem. Soft brushed inside. Leggings in soft jersey with an elasticated waist and decorative bow at the hems.

Set with a long-sleeved top and leggings in soft, organic cotton jersey. Top with a round neckline and rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Leggings with an elasticated waist and sewn-in creases at the front.

STUDIO COLLECTION. Short dress in wool and nylon twill in a narrow cut at the top with a concealed zip at the back and deep armholes. Seam at the hips with a wide, raw-edge band, front pockets with a raw edge, and a raw-edge hem. Lined.
Short, strappy top in jersey containing glittery threads.
Sweatshirt in a relaxed fit with long raglan sleeves, ribbed panels at the sides and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Trenchcoat in a soft weave with a small stand-up collar, lapels at the front and a double-layered yoke. Long, raglan sleeves, welt side pockets and a tie belt at the waist. Unlined.

Checked suit trousers in soft, brushed, stretch fabric with a zip fly and hook-and-eye fastening. Side pockets, welt back pockets with a button and legs with creases front and back. Skinny Fit – a fit with slightly shorter legs that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a completely fitted silhouette.
Top in a crêpe weave with a V-shaped opening at the front, small stand-up collar, yoke with a pleat at the back and a rounded hem.
Push-up bra in lace and mesh with underwired, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
T-shirt in soft, printed cotton jersey.

Long-sleeved top in soft sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend. Jersey-lined hood with a wrapover front, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside. The cotton content of the top is organic.
T-shirt in slub cotton jersey with a wide neckline and tie detail at the front.
Baby Exclusive. Dungaree shorts in airy linen with a button at the sides, straps with adjustable buttoning, patch front pockets and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems. Lined in soft cotton poplin.
T-shirts in organic cotton jersey.
Long-sleeved top in soft slub cotton jersey with a print motif on the front and an elasticated seam at the hips with a wide frill trim.
Trainers in imitation suede with a padded top edge, lacing at the front and loop at the back. Mesh linings, cotton insoles and a fabric trim around the soles.
High-waisted trousers in woven fabric with an extended waistband with a button, zip fly, side pockets, a welt back pocket with a button and straight, wide legs with creases.
Straight-cut jacket in soft faux fur with a collar, press-studs down the front, flap chest pockets with a press-stud, and welt side pockets. Brushed inside.

Blouse in an airy cotton weave with embroidery. Double-layered section with inset lace trims and an opening with narrow ties at the top of the front. Long, wide raglan sleeves with narrow, covered elastication at the cuffs.
Imitation leather trainers with a lightly padded top edge, elasticated lacing and a hook and loop tab at the front. Contrasting colour heel caps and mesh linings and insoles.
T-shirt in lightweight jersey with a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Jacquard-patterned socks in a soft cotton blend with elasticated tops.
Short, off-the-shoulder top in crinkled jersey with smocking around the neckline and hem and long, wide sleeves with elastication at the cuffs.
Fine-knit socks in a soft cotton blend with elasticated tops.

Ballet pumps in imitation leather with a grosgrain trim around the top edge. Elastic strap over the foot, a decorative bow at the front and small loop at the back. Fabric linings and insoles. Height of soles 0.4 cm.
Sleeveless tunic in an airy weave with a V-neck, small wrapover with a pleat at the front, and a rounded hem. The polyester content of the tunic is partly recycled.
KATE MORGAN x H&M. Shorts in an airy, patterned viscose weave with a contrasting colour trim with tassels at the front and covered elastication at the back of the waist. Diagonal side pockets.
Chinos in cotton twill with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly, side pockets, a fake back pocket with a button and slim legs.
V-neck T-shirt in soft cotton jersey.
Joggers in soft twill with a regular, elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets, fake back pockets and tapered legs.
Top in printed sweatshirt fabric with a lined, drawstring hood and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.

Rain jacket in wind- and waterproof functional fabric. Detachable hood with covered elastication, a zip and button band with press-studs down the front and raglan sleeves with covered elastication at the cuffs. Flap front pockets with a press-stud. Unlined. The jacket has a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.

Parka in a sturdy weave with a fleece-lined drawstring hood with a faux fur trim, two-way zip down the front and double wind flap with a hook and loop fastening. Concealed zipped pocket under the wind flaps, flap chest and front pockets and one sleeve pocket, all with a hook and loop fastening, fleece-lined handwarmer pockets and one inner pocket. Concealed drawstring at the waist and inner ribbing at the cuffs. Polyester filling. Quilted lining.

Short, boxy-style jacket in washed cotton denim with hard-worn details. Collar, buttons down the front and a yoke. Dropped shoulders, long, wide sleeves with buttoned cuffs, chest pockets with a button and discreet diagonal front pockets. The cotton content of the jacket is partly recycled.
Wide, high-waisted, 5-pocket trousers in wide wale corduroy with a zip fly and button and gently flared legs.
Hat in soft pile with decorative ears and ties under the chin.
V-neck top in an airy weave with pleats on the shoulders, short, raglan flutter sleeves, and a rounded hem. Loose fit.

Strapless bandeau bra in jersey with padded cups that shape the bust and provide good support. Wide, ribbed trim at the hem and no fasteners. The bra is designed with the minimum number of seams for a seamless, comfortable feel against the skin.

5-pocket, ankle-length jeans in washed, stretch denim with worn details. High waist, zip fly and button and skinny legs. Embrace – denim with a smart stretch function that moulds to the body for a comfortable, flattering silhouette.
Knee-length lace dress with a V-neck at the front and double, narrow shoulder straps that cross at the back. Seam at the waist, concealed zip in the side and a flared, asymmetric skirt.  Lined.
Blouse in softly draping silk with a small frilled collar with ties at the front. Opening at the top, long sleeves with narrow cuffs and a covered button, and a rounded hem.
Platform trainers with lacing at the front, cotton canvas linings and insoles and rubber soles. Platform 3.5 cm.
Straight-style, ankle-length dress in a textured-knit viscose blend with a collar, V-neck, low dropped shoulders and short sleeves. Slits in the sides and an overlocked hem.
Waist bag with a zip at the top, a zipped outer compartment and an adjustable strap with a plastic fastener. Lined. Size 6x13x19 cm.
Gloves in a soft, fine knit with ribbed cuffs. The tops of the thumb and index finger are in touchscreen-compatible material.
Lace thong briefs with a low waist, lined gusset, narrow sides and string back.
Treggings in organic cotton corduroy with an elasticated waist, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
Patterned swim shorts with elastication and ties at the waist and a fly with a hook and loop fastening. Soft mesh inner shorts.

Outdoor jacket with light padding front and back in woven fabric, a lined hood and zip down the front. Zipped side pockets and long raglan sleeves with thumbholes at the cuffs. Lightly brushed thermal lining in the sleeves and side sections. Partly lined.
Vest top in soft jersey made partly from organic cotton.
Short top in printed sweatshirt fabric with a lined drawstring hood, dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Patterned skirt in a soft, fine knit with an elasticated waist and ribbed hem.
5-pocket, high-waisted jeans in washed stretch denim with worn details, a zip fly and button and skinny legs.
Long-sleeved jumper in a fine-knit viscose blend with a round neckline, sewn-on decorative bow at the top and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Long-sleeved jumper in a soft knit with a round neckline and ribbed trims.

Ankle-length chinos in washed, stretch cotton twill with a zip fly and button, diagonal side pockets and welt back pockets. Slim Fit – a fit which is relaxed over the thighs and tapers from the knees down for a relaxed, well-tailored look.
Small pouch in imitation leather with a zip at the top. Size 5x6x8 cm.
V-neck blouse woven in a cotton blend with slits in the sides. Long balloon sleeves with embroidery and buttoned cuffs.

Dress in soft washed Tencel™ lyocell denim with a small stand-up collar and V-neck with decorative buttons down the front. Short, flounced sleeves, an elasticated seam at the back of the waist and a detachable tie belt. Unlined.

Playsuit in plumeti chiffon containing glittery threads with a small frilled collar and an opening at the back with a button at the back of the neck. Long, wide sleeves with a frill trim at the cuffs, an elasticated seam and detachable tie belt at the waist, and short legs. Partly lined in jersey.
Mittens in a soft, fine knit. Fleece lining.
Short top in an airy cotton weave. Square neckline with a narrow elastication, short, elasticated puff sleeves and elasticated hem.

Backpack in woven fabric with a handle at the top and a roll-top opening with an adjustable tab and plastic fastener. Adjustable, padded shoulder straps with D-rings, a padded back plate and side pockets, one in mesh. Lined. Size 14x27x46 cm.

Single-breasted jacket in a stretch weave made from a linen blend with narrow notch lapels, a chest pocket, flap front pockets and two inner pockets. Decorative buttons at the cuffs and a single back vent. Partly lined. Skinny Fit – a slightly shorter style that shapes in at the chest and tapers sharply at the waist. This combined with narrow shoulders and sleeves creates a completely fitted silhouette.
